SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.card

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am01.model.card.Card
public class Card extends Object
Card represents placeable card of the game (which are allocated into PlayArea). In particular: resource, gold and starter card

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int id, CardColor baseColor, boolean isStarter, boolean isGold, FrontCardFace front, BackCardFace back)
      Constructs a new Card and sets all parameters specified
      Parameters:
      id - The id of card
      baseColor - The color of card
      isStarter - A boolean that specified if card is starter or not
      isGold - A boolean that specified if card is golden or not
      front - The front face of card
      back - The back face of card

  • Method Details

    • id

      public int id()
      Provides id of the card
      Returns:
      Returns the id of the card

    • color

      public CardColor color()
      Provides color of the card. Starter card has NEUTRAL color
      Returns:
      Returns the color of the card

    • isStarter

      public boolean isStarter()
      Establish if card is starter or not
      Returns:
      Returns true if card is a starter, otherwise false

    • isGold

      public boolean isGold()
      Establish if card is a gold card or resource card
      Returns:
      Returns true if card is gold, otherwise false

    • getFace

      public CardFace getFace(Side s)
      Provides specific face of the card
      Parameters:
      s - A reference to the side of the card
      Returns:
      Returns the CardFace of the required side
